pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: University of North Texas Music Library
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Over 250 16-inch broadcast transcriptions dated from July of 1941 through February of 1950, divided more or less evenly between news material (principally from the NBC "Blue" network) and "classical" music: largely orchestral music, with some opera selections.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: Discs may not all be glass-based, but the original collection name has persisted.
pageContext._xxxcollectionUsageStatementxtxt: Reproduction and publication of materials in this collection are subject to the policies of the UNT Music Library. Copyright restrictions may apply.
